sentences.en: As the puzzle , like the Sphinx, it is difficult to answer!
sentences.cn: 这谜题却如同斯芬克斯的问题, 想找答案难上加难!

sentences.en: Atop Athena's helmet, between winged griffins, crouched an inscrutable sphinx.
sentences.cn: 在雅典娜头盔的上方 、 于带翼的狮身鹰首兽之间, 蹲伏着一头神秘难测的狮身人史芬克斯.

sentences.en: Did the Sphinx give Oedipus a clue?
sentences.cn: 斯芬尼克斯给俄狄浦斯线索了 吗 ?

sentences.en: I heard the Sphinx, but I did not understand.
sentences.cn: 我听到了斯蒂芬斯的话, 却不懂得.

sentences.en: I. Comparisons to a Living Creature ( i . e . , the Sphinx riddle )
sentences.cn: 1.比作某种生物 ( 如斯芬克司谜 )

sentences.en: I've always found her rather sphinx - like.
sentences.cn: 我总觉得她像个谜一样,难以捉摸.

sentences.en: It suited him to play the sphinx.
sentences.cn: 让他演神秘莫测的人很合适。

sentences.en: She was the picture of a serene and exquisite but impenetrable sphinx.
sentences.cn: 她看上去就象一尊非常安详精致、但又高深莫测的狮身人面像.

sentences.en: That we should finally learn from this Sphinx to ask questions , too?
sentences.cn: 最后我们若产生怀疑,失去耐心,或不耐烦地走开, 你会惊奇 吗 ?

sentences.en: The Great Pyramids and the Sphinx are nearby.
sentences.cn: 雄伟的金字塔和狮身人面像就在附近.

sentences.en: The lion was a monster sphinx which was astray like them in that gulf of darkness.
sentences.cn: 这只狮子是个丑怪的斯芬克斯,跟他们一样迷失在这黑暗的深渊里.

sentences.en: The Majestically - holding Sphinx : A View on " My Ah Q "
sentences.cn: 雄踞的斯芬克斯: 论 “ 我的阿Q ”

sentences.en: Tongue Twister J _ K _ L Just think, that sphinx has a sphincter that stinks!
sentences.cn: 试想想, 那个狮身人面像的括约肌发臭了!

sentences.en: We set off to see the Pyramids and Sphinx.
sentences.cn: 我们出发去看金字塔和狮身人面像。

sentences.en: Were you there when the Pharaohs commissioned the Sphinx?
sentences.cn: 当法老王打造人面狮身时你在那儿 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: （古埃及）[建]狮身人面像；难于理解的人；天蛾

trans.tran_en: an ancient Egyptian image of a lion with a human head, lying down
